long_description: The SealLine eSeries(R) 8 case is sized to protect smaller smartphones, such as BlackBerry(R) Curve(TM) and Bold(TM), from moisture when you're out in wet weather or on the water. Tough, completely transparent polyurethane windows are soft enough to let you view and use the touch screen without removing device from the case. In addition to BlackBerry phones, the eSeries 8 fits point-and-shoot cameras and other palm-size electronics. PVC-free polyurethane material resists UV damage, so it remains transparent. SealLock(TM) closure meets IPX7 waterproof standards to withstand submersion down to 1m for 30 min. The SealLine eSeries 8 case attaches to a kayak deck or pack straps using cords or clips (not included) and 2 corner lash points. Closeout.
short_description: The SealLine eSeries(R) 8 case is sized to protect smaller smartphones, such as BlackBerry(R) Curve(TM) and Bold(TM), from moisture when you're out in wet weather or on the water.
